sn4:21.1.4_1: ghurughurupassāsī udumbaradaṇḍaṁ gahetvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn4:21.1.5_0: “daharā bhavanto pabbajitā susū kāḷakesā bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatā paṭhamena vayasā anikkīḷitāvino kāmesu.
sn4:21.1.8_0: “Na kho mayaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhikaṁ hitvā kālikaṁ anudhāvāma.
sn4:21.1.9_0: Kālikañca kho mayaṁ, brāhmaṇa, hitvā sandiṭṭhikaṁ anudhāvāma.
sn4:21.1.10_0: Kālikā hi, brāhmaṇa, kāmā vuttā bhagavatā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
sn4:21.1.11_0: Sandiṭṭhiko ayaṁ dhammo akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī”ti.
sn4:21.1.12_1: māro pāpimā sīsaṁ okampetvā jivhaṁ nillāletvā tivisākhaṁ nalāṭe nalāṭikaṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā daṇḍamolubbha pakkāmi.
sn4:21.2.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn4:21.2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn4:21.2.2_0: “idha mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavato avidūre appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharāma.
sn4:21.2.3_1: aññataro brāhmaṇo mahantena jaṭaṇḍuvena ajinakkhipanivattho jiṇṇo gopānasivaṅko ghurughurupassāsī udumbaradaṇḍaṁ gahetvā yena mayaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
sn4:21.2.4_0: ‘daharā bhavanto pabbajitā susū kāḷakesā bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatā paṭhamena vayasā anikkīḷitāvino kāmesu.
sn4:21.2.7_0: Evaṁ vutte, mayaṁ, bhante, taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ etadavocumha:
sn4:21.2.8_0: ‘na kho mayaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhikaṁ hitvā kālikaṁ anudhāvāma.
sn4:21.2.9_0: Kālikañca kho mayaṁ, brāhmaṇa, hitvā sandiṭṭhikaṁ anudhāvāma.
sn4:21.2.10_0: Kālikā hi, brāhmaṇa, kāmā vuttā bhagavatā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
sn4:21.2.11_0: Sandiṭṭhiko ayaṁ dhammo akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
sn4:21.2.12_1: so brāhmaṇo sīsaṁ okampetvā jivhaṁ nillāletvā tivisākhaṁ nalāṭe nalāṭikaṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā daṇḍamolubbha pakkanto”ti.
sn4:21.3.2_0: Māro eso pāpimā tumhākaṁ vicakkhukammāya āgato”ti.
sn4:21.3.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn4:22.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati silāvatiyaṁ.
sn4:22.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā samiddhi bhagavato avidūre appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharati.
sn4:22.1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmato samiddhissa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn4:22.1.6_0: Lābhā vata me, suladdhaṁ vata me,
sn4:22.1.8_0: Lābhā vata me, suladdhaṁ vata me,
sn4:22.1.10_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā āyasmato samiddhissa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yenāyasmā samiddhi tenupasaṅkami;
sn4:22.1.10_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmato samiddhissa avidūre mahantaṁ bhayabheravaṁ saddamakāsi,
sn4:22.2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4:22.2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno āyasmā samiddhi bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn4:22.2.2_0: “idhāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato avidūre appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharāmi.
sn4:22.2.3_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn4:22.2.6_0: Lābhā vata me, suladdhaṁ vata me,
sn4:22.2.8_0: Lābhā vata me, suladdhaṁ vata me,
sn4:22.2.10_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, avidūre mahābhayabheravasaddo ahosi, apissudaṁ pathavī maññe undrīyatī”ti.
sn4:22.3.2_0: Māro eso pāpimā tuyhaṁ vicakkhukammāya āgato.
sn4:22.3.3_0: Gaccha tvaṁ, samiddhi, tattheva appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharāhī”ti.
sn4:22.3.4_1: bhante”ti kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavato paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
sn4:22.3.5_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā samiddhi tattheva appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihāsi.
sn4:22.3.6_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmato samiddhissa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa …pe…
sn4:22.3.7_0: dutiyampi kho māro pāpimā āyasmato samiddhissa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya …pe…
sn4:22.3.9_0: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi māraṁ pāpimantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4:22.5.1_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṁ samiddhi bhikkhū”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
sn4:23.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn4:23.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā godhiko isigilipasse viharati kāḷasilāyaṁ.
sn4:23.1.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṁ cetovimuttiṁ phusi.
sn4:23.1.5_0: Atha kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4:23.1.6_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṁ cetovimuttiṁ phusi.
sn4:23.1.7_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4:23.1.8_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṁ cetovimuttiṁ phusi.
sn4:23.1.9_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā …pe… parihāyi.
sn4:23.1.10_0: Catutthampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto …pe… vimuttiṁ phusi.
sn4:23.1.11_0: Catutthampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā …pe… parihāyi.
sn4:23.1.12_0: Pañcamampi kho āyasmā godhiko …pe… cetovimuttiṁ phusi.
sn4:23.1.14_0: Chaṭṭhampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṁ cetovimuttiṁ phusi.
sn4:23.1.15_0: Chaṭṭhampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4:23.1.16_0: Sattamampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṁ cetovimuttiṁ phusi.
sn4:23.2.4_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā āyasmato godhikassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4:23.6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā godhikena satthaṁ āharitaṁ hoti.
sn4:23.6.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṁ pāpimā” iti viditvā māraṁ pāpimantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4:23.8.2_2: yena isigilipassaṁ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkamissāma yattha godhikena kulaputtena satthaṁ āharitan”ti.
sn4:23.8.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn4:23.9.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena isigilipassaṁ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkami.
sn4:23.9.2_0: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ godhikaṁ dūratova mañcake vivattakkhandhaṁ semānaṁ.
sn4:23.9.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena dhūmāyitattaṁ timirāyitattaṁ gacchateva purimaṁ disaṁ,
sn4:23.10.2_2: etaṁ dhūmāyitattaṁ timirāyitattaṁ gacchateva purimaṁ disaṁ,
sn4:23.10.4_0: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṁ samanvesati:
sn4:23.10.6_0: Appatiṭṭhitena ca, bhikkhave, viññāṇena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto”ti.
sn4:23.10.7_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṁ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4:24.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā uruvelāyaṁ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre ajapālanigrodhe.
sn4:24.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena māro pāpimā sattavassāni bhagavantaṁ anubandho hoti otārāpekkho otāraṁ alabhamāno.
sn4:24.1.4_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4:24.8.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhante, gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre pokkharaṇī.
sn4:24.8.3_1: sambahulā kumārakā vā kumārikāyo vā tamhā gāmā vā nigamā vā nikkhamitvā yena sā pokkharaṇī tenupasaṅkameyyuṁ;
sn4:24.8.3_2: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ kakkaṭakaṁ udakā uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhapeyyuṁ.
sn4:24.8.4_1: kakkaṭako aḷaṁ abhininnāmeyya taṁ tadeva te kumārakā vā kumārikāyo vā kaṭṭhena vā kathalāya vā sañchindeyyuṁ sambhañjeyyuṁ sampalibhañjeyyuṁ.
sn4:24.8.5_1: kakkaṭako sabbehi aḷehi sañchinnehi sambhaggehi sampalibhaggehi abhabbo taṁ pokkharaṇiṁ otarituṁ.
sn4:24.8.6_2: sabbāni tāni bhagavatā sañchinnāni sambhaggāni sampalibhaggāni.
sn4:24.8.7_0: Abhabbo dānāhaṁ, bhante, puna bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamituṁ yadidaṁ otārāpekkho”ti.
sn4:24.8.8_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā bhagavato santike imā nibbejanīyā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn4:25.1.1_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā bhagavato santike imā nibbejanīyā gāthāyo abhāsitvā tamhā ṭhānā apakkamma bhagavato
sn4:25.1.1_1: avidūre pathaviyaṁ pallaṅkena nisīdi tuṇhībhūto maṅkubhūto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhāyanto appaṭibhāno
sn4:25.1.2_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro yena māro pāpimā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn4:25.4.1_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn4:25.4.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā na manasākāsi, yathā taṁ anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye vimutto.
sn4:25.5.1_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro ekamantaṁ apakkamma evaṁ samacintesuṁ:
sn4:25.5.3_0: Yannūna mayaṁ ekasataṁ ekasataṁ kumārivaṇṇasataṁ abhinimmineyyāmā”ti.
sn4:25.5.4_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro ekasataṁ ekasataṁ kumārivaṇṇasataṁ abhinimminitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn4:25.5.6_0: Tampi bhagavā na manasākāsi, yathā taṁ anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye vimutto.
sn4:25.6.1_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro ekamantaṁ apakkamma evaṁ samacintesuṁ:
sn4:25.6.3_0: Yannūna mayaṁ ekasataṁ ekasataṁ avijātavaṇṇasataṁ abhinimmineyyāmā”ti.
sn4:25.6.4_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro ekasataṁ ekasataṁ avijātavaṇṇasataṁ abhinimminitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn4:25.6.6_0: Tampi bhagavā na manasākāsi, yathā taṁ anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye vimutto.
sn4:25.7.2_0: yannūna mayaṁ ekasataṁ ekasataṁ sakiṁ vijātavaṇṇasataṁ abhinimmineyyāmāti.
sn4:25.7.4_0: sakiṁ vijātavaṇṇasataṁ abhinimminitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn4:25.7.6_0: Tampi bhagavā na manasākāsi, yathā taṁ anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye vimutto.
sn4:25.8.2_0: yannūna mayaṁ ekasataṁ ekasataṁ duvijātavaṇṇasataṁ abhinimmineyyāmāti.
sn4:25.9.6_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro ekamantaṁ apakkamma etadavocuṁ:
sn4:25.11.1_0: Yañhi mayaṁ samaṇaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā avītarāgaṁ iminā upakkamena upakkameyyāma hadayaṁ vāssa phaleyya,
sn4:25.11.2_0: Seyyathā vā pana naḷo harito luto ussussati visussati milāyati;
sn4:25.12.1_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn4:25.12.2_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho taṇhā māradhītā bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4:25.15.1_0: Atha kho arati māradhītā bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4:25.17.4_0: Na kuppati na sarati na thino.
sn4:25.19.1_0: Atha kho ragā māradhītā bhagavato santike gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4:25.22.1_0: Atha kho taṇhā ca arati ca ragā ca māradhītaro yena māro pāpimā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
sn4:25.22.2_0: Addasā kho māro pāpimā taṇhañca aratiñca ragañca māradhītaro dūratova āgacchantiyo.
